text: in a quiet unassuming sort of way isabel
de noir made history 11 years ago she
was given a partial face transplant
after being mauled by her pet dog it was
the first operation of its kind and it
offered her a second chance after I
leave Hospital I want to return to my
family life
I want to restart a professional career
and I expect to resume a normal life in
a groundbreaking 15 hour operation she
was given a new nose chin and lips the
pioneering surgery paved the way for
transplants all around the world people
who had been severely disfigured now had
new faces and new opportunities but for
isabel de noir there were complications
it's believed more than once her body
rejected the transplant and it's
reported last year she lost the use of
her lips and the drug she had to take at
serious side-effects her immune system
was weakened and she eventually
succumbed to cancer but if Isabel de
noir ever regretted the surgery she
never let on I have a face like everyone
else she said a door to the future is
opening
